name: Circle Hurdle
description:
Take on the Circle Hurdle challenge!
Are you game?

HOW TO PLAY:

Tap to jump, double tap to jump higher.
Avoid spikes & other crazy obstacles!

The circle will spin clockwise or anticlockwise
at varying speeds, time your jumping to perfection
to reach the top of the leaderboard.

With every successful jump you’ll earn a star,
collect 150 stars to unlock a new character.
There are 50 awesome characters to collect.

FEATURES
◉ Endless high score mode
◉ Challenge Mode - 24 tricky levels
◉ Addictive gameplay
◉ Chilled music
◉ One tap controls
◉ 50 characters to unlock

#CircleHurdle
